##Getting and Cleaning Data Assignment

The __*Getting and Cleaning assignment.R*__ script downloads and unzips the required raw data and outputs two data frames: one called __*data*__ containing the tidied molten data, the other called __*data_means*__ containing the measurement means by subject and activity. The *data*-set is provided here in csv.
